ProjectsArray.Title: Employee Portal
ProjectsArray.About: FDMployee. A University Project where my group and I were assigned an external client from FDM Group to create an employee portal that met the client's requirements.This was a 12 week long project where we as a group had frequent meetings with out client whilst following the software development cycle.

ProjectsArray.Title: Weather Application
ProjectsArray.About: A University Project where my group and I were tasked with asking members of the public of their grievances with current popular weather applications and then using this information to create a new application using React which would fufill these requirements..

ProjectsArray.Title: Auction Website
ProjectsArray.About: A University Project where my group and I were tasked with creating an auction website similar in functionality to eBay where users can buy and sell items.

ProjectsArray.Title: Approximating Bayesian Inference through Discretization
ProjectsArray.About: My University Dissertation where I created a piece of code that would simulate other currently established bayesian inference methods but by using discretization rather than taking a continuous approach
